Reviews.Title: Great value!!!!
Reviews.Author: Johnny
Reviews.Content: You normally get what you pay for in CCTV.  In this case you get more than what you pay for.  The cameras are ok, the DVR takes a while to boot but shows the same quality picture on playback as when live.  Great value for the quality.

ProductInfo.Features:
Supports Remote Viewing from Smartphone and 3G Mobile Viewing
2TB Hard Drive Preinstalled
Hybrid DVR: Supports both Analog Cameras & Onvif IP Cameras
Full 16CH D1 Real Time Recording and Playback
HDMI/VGA/BNC Video Outputs
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo 16 Channel All D1 High Profile HDMI SDVR(Super Digital Video Recorder) Security Surveillance DVR With 2TB Hard Drive
